content.raw:
I managed to get a couple of test failure out of 5 tries, looks like timing issue:

~~~
[ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/SimEventsTest.ModelInAnOutOfRegion/1
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 172.23.1.93
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:144] ServerFixture load in 1.2 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
/home/ian/depot/clones/gazebo/test/integration/sim_events.cc:194: Failure
Expected: (countAfter2) > (countBefore2), actual: 100 vs 100
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:95] ServerFixture::Unload
[  FAILED  ] PhysicsEngines/SimEventsTest.ModelInAnOutOfRegion/1, where GetParam() = "bullet" (2448 ms)
~~~
~~~
[ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/SimEventsTest.ModelInAnOutOfRegion/1
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 172.23.1.93
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:144] ServerFixture load in 1.3 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
/home/ian/depot/clones/gazebo/test/integration/sim_events.cc:188: Failure
Expected: (countAfter1) > (countBefore1), actual: 100 vs 100
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:95] ServerFixture::Unload
[  FAILED  ] PhysicsEngines/SimEventsTest.ModelInAnOutOfRegion/1, where GetParam() = "bullet" (2550 ms)
~~~
